About the Company: Accel Limited was started in 1991 as a multi vendor IT services company in Chennai. It evolved over the past three decades, creating niche entities on a versatile range of domains to meet the requirements of the discerning IT user community with state of the art solutions and services. Accel offers a wide range of services that include IT Infrastructure Management services, Warranty Management Services, Managed Print Services, Cyber Security, and Software Services, with strong presence in the domestic and international markets.
